mapping.timeseries_properties: @.timeseries[*].{id:id, scenario:scenario_id, region:region, variable: join('|', [@.region, @.technology, @.technology_type, @.parameter_name]), unit: unit, year: getTsYear(@.timeindex_start, @.timeindex_stop), source: source, timeindex_start: timeindex_start, timeindex_stop: timeindex_stop, timeindex_resolution: timeindex_resolution, series: series}
